# Request for Proposal (Request to Buy): EREP: Weir Skimmers
## Government of Canada Tender Announcement
### Reference Number: PW_ERD-014-29358
#### Tender Status: Expired
#### Amendments Issued: 6

#### Tender Details
* **Title:** 45m3/h and 90m3/h Weir Skimmers for Oil Spill Recovery
* **Trade Agreements:** CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, CFTA, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and UK
* **Compliance Requirements:** Subject to provisions of the WTO-AGP, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Strategy:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Contract Duration:** Above-mentioned

#### Offer Requirements
* **Proposal Submission:** Interested suppliers may submit a proposal directly to the Government of Canada's electronic procurement system, Canada-Buy
* **Solicitation Documents:** Available on Canada-Buy's website, [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en)
* **Amendments:** Solicitation amendments, if issued, will be available on the [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en)

#### Supporting Information
* **Procurement Business Number (PBN):** Required for all suppliers
* **Supplier Registration:** For non-registered suppliers, contact the Supplier Registration Information Line at 1-800-811-1148
* **Pricing and Delivery:** Must be submitted using the Government of Canada's electronic procurement system, CPC Connect
* **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Contacts
* **Contracting Authority:** Bakhos, Maya, Contracting Authority [Contact Information](https://contact-us/)

#### Supplier Information
* **Businesses interested in selling to the Government of Canada:** [link](https://BuyAndSell.gc.ca/for-businesses/selling-to-the-government-of-canada)
* **Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) Seminars:** [link](https://www.canada.ca/en/public-services-procurement/services/acquisitions/support-for-businesses/get-assistance.html)
